name: Mahogany Teakwood
description: A fine wood fragrance combination of mahogany, cedar wood, and oak topped with scents of fresh lavender and geranium.

name: Pardon My French
description: This candle gives off a sweet, sugary aroma of fresh vanilla beans mixed with a French latte.

name: Champagne Life
description: Our version of the infamous Champagne Toast by Bath & Body Works. This candle has a subtle, yet sweet scent. A perfect blend of sparkling berries and juicy tangerine. Oh and of course... Champagne. Let’s toast to the good life!

name: Peppermint Twist
description: Notes of eucalyptus and spearmint perfectly blended to create a minty fresh scent.

name: Laundry Day
description: After a long day of cleaning, fill the house with the aromas of fresh linen.

name: Caribbean Bliss
description: Have you ever been to paradise? Let this sweet fragrance of tropical fruits and berries lead you there in bliss.

name: Amaretto Sour
description: Who doesn't love an Amaretto Sour after a long, hot day in the sun? Notes of sweet cherries, vanilla, and tonka beans gives off a fruity scent that'll put a smile on anyone's face.

name: Lemon Drop
description: I heard the girls love a good Lemon Drop! The aromas of lemongrass, cotton candy, and vanilla are carefully blended to create the perfect summer scent.

name: Let's Get Naked
description: Strawberries, bananas, peaches, and melons blended together to make you take off your clothes and get naked!

name: Wick Trimmer
description: Elevate your candle care routine with the Essential Scents Wick Trimmer—the perfect tool for ensuring a clean, long-lasting burn for your favorite candles.

name: Wick Trimmer
description: Elevate your candle care routine with the Essential Scents Wick Trimmer—the perfect tool for ensuring a clean, long-lasting burn for your favorite candles.

name: Wick Trimmer
description: Elevate your candle care routine with the Essential Scents Wick Trimmer—the perfect tool for ensuring a clean, long-lasting burn for your favorite candles.
